message.body: Respond to this message ASAP confirming that you'll be at the Dinky at 3:10!
Hey Chris I forgot when I wa at your house but do you have a pair of black shoes I could wear tomorrow? I'm a size 9 but any bigger size is fine, too.
I'll be sure to grab some tomorrow morning, quinton. Good thinking
Have you left yet? I forgot to mention that I also don't have socks
